name: matchenv
description: Ppx to help target multiple architecture

scripts.test: eval $(dependencyEnv) && GL_BACKEND=native ocamlfind ocamlopt -dsource -pp "refmt --print binary" -ppx ./ppx_matchenv.exe -impl test.re
scripts.postinstall: eval $(dependencyEnv) && nopam && ocamlfind ocamlopt -package compiler-libs.common -pp "refmt --print binary" -linkpkg -impl src/index.re -o ppx_matchenv.exe

author: bsansouci
